resources.string:
• You can edit the location and distance defaults for Available and Routed work

  • More helpful descriptions for the user when encountering errors

  • Removed the footer bar on work order lists

  • Fixed distance between user and work site on work order cards

  • Other misc bug fixes

• Fixed crashes caused by rotating the phone while uploading photos
  • Fixed app getting stuck in retry loop while downloading files
  • Bullet points now show up in work order descriptions

• New look and feel
  • More work order search options
